thread.title: Comey "seems like a disgruntled ex-employee": Conway

title: Comey "seems like a disgruntled ex-employee": Conway
text:
Comey "seems like a disgruntled ex-employee": Conway 4:08pm BST - 01:09 
Trump adviser Kellyanne Conway lashes out at James Comey after the former FBI director gave a harsh assessment of the U.S. president in interviews about Comey's new book. Rough Cut (no reporter narration.) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Trump adviser Kellyanne Conway lashes out at James Comey after the former FBI director gave a harsh assessment of the U.S. president in interviews about Comey's new book.
